sections.Description (verbatim):
You are outside a large gateway, on which is inscribed
	Abandon every hope all ye who enter here!

The gate is open; through it you can see a desolation, with a pile of mangled bodies in one corner. Thousands of voices, lamenting some hideous fate, can be heard.
The way through the gate is barred by evil spirits, who jeer at your attempts to pass.
Blocked movements: S → "Some invisible force prevents you from passing through the gate." (Before performing ritual)
Hidden/conditional transitions: Must perform ritual (ring bell, light candles, read book) to dispel invisible force
